summary: Navy divers clear the torpedo tube of a sunken submarine.
cast: Kenneth MacKenna|Frank Albertson|J. Farrell MacDonald|Warren Hymer|Paul Page|Walter McGrail|Stuart Erwin|George LeGuere|Charles K. Gerrard|Ben Hendricks Jr.|Harry Tenbrook|Warner Richmond|Frank Baker|Wong Chung|Ivan Lebedeff|Alberto Morin|Frank Richardson|Pat Somerset|Roy Stewart|John Wayne
title: Tragedia submarina
